item.title: Lorena Fontana - A Vision - Making of
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: This video is the official behind-the-scenes in LA while recording A Vision by Lorena Fontana, in the studios of Dennis Moody. I had the fortune to fully edit and assemble the video footage which gives a nice rendition of the atmosphere only professional musicians can breathe.
